languages.text: "Великое дело не вершится миром. Оно вершится кровью, пролитой праведной рукой!"
"A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
languages.original_text: "Великое дело не вершится миром. Оно вершится кровью, пролитой праведной рукой!"

traits.locale_text: "A great work is not accomplished by making peace. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "A great work is not accomplished by making peace. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: « On n'accomplit pas de grandes choses en faisant la paix, mais en versant le sang d'une main vertueuse ! »
languages.original_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"

traits.locale_text: « On n'accomplit pas de grandes choses en faisant la paix, mais en versant le sang d'une main vertueuse ! »
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: «Las grandes hazañas no consisten en traer la paz. ¡Consisten en derramar sangre en nombre de la justicia!».
languages.original_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"

traits.locale_text: «Las grandes hazañas no consisten en traer la paz. ¡Consisten en derramar sangre en nombre de la justicia!».
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: “伟大的事业不是靠和平手段实现的，是靠正义之手洒下的鲜血实现的！”
languages.original_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"

traits.locale_text: “伟大的事业不是靠和平手段实现的，是靠正义之手洒下的鲜血实现的！”
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: 「偉業は平和の創造によって成し遂げられるのではない。正しき手で血を流すことによって成し遂げられるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"

traits.locale_text: 「偉業は平和の創造によって成し遂げられるのではない。正しき手で血を流すことによって成し遂げられるのだ！」
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Große Taten vollbringt man nicht, indem man den Frieden hütet. Sondern indem man mit rechtschaffener Hand Blut vergießt!"
languages.original_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"

traits.locale_text: "Große Taten vollbringt man nicht, indem man den Frieden hütet. Sondern indem man mit rechtschaffener Hand Blut vergießt!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Büyük icraatlar barışla başarılmaz. Hakkaniyetli bir elle kan dökerek başarılır!"
languages.original_text: "A great deed is not accomplished by peacemaking. It is accomplished by spilling blood with a righteous hand!"
